author: psmith
msg: Made this class public for use within other package.

author: psmith
msg: Introduced a Message Center concept to decouple the element
within Chainsaw that need to display messages to the user.

author: psmith
msg: Once and for all (touch wood) solved the problem of some components
not getting the chance to get the correct l&f.
This is done by loading the App pref model BEFORE any GUI elements
get initialised, and therefore we know what the correct L&F should be.

author: psmith
msg: Jalopied.  App Pref panel can now handle L&F.
